    lineDash: [3, 3],

});

axis

▸ axis(field: boolean): View

Inherited from View.axis

Defined in src/chart/view.ts:357

开启或者关闭坐标轴。

 view.axis(false); // 不展示坐标轴

Parameters:

Name Type Description
field boolean 坐标轴开关

Returns: View

▸ axis(field: string, axisOption: AxisOption): View

Inherited from View.axis

Defined in src/chart/view.ts:374

对特定的某条坐标轴进行配置。

example

view.axis('city', false); // 不展示 'city' 字段对应的坐标轴

// 将 'city' 字段对应的坐标轴的标题隐藏
view.axis('city', {
  title: null,
});

Parameters:

Name Type Description
field string 要配置的坐标轴对应的字段名称
axisOption AxisOption 坐标轴具体配置

Returns: View

data Data

coordinate

▸ coordinate(option?: CoordinateOption): CoordinateController

Inherited from View.coordinate

Defined in src/chart/view.ts:530

坐标系配置。

example

view.coordinate({
  type: 'polar',
  cfg: {
    radius: 0.85,
  },
  actions: [
    [ 'transpose' ],
  ],
});

Parameters:

Name Type
option? CoordinateOption

Returns: CoordinateController

▸ coordinate(type: string, coordinateCfg?: CoordinateCfg): CoordinateController

Inherited from View.coordinate

Defined in src/chart/view.ts:546

声明坐标系类型，并进行配置。

// 直角坐标系，并进行转置变换
view.coordinate('rect').transpose();

// 默认创建直角坐标系
view.coordinate();

Parameters:

Name Type Description
type string 坐标系类型
coordinateCfg? CoordinateCfg -

Returns: CoordinateController
